definition: breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: Shown below are specific features of edge-to-edge holographic CD's.
sentences.chinese: 下面介紹邊到邊全息圖像光盤的具體特徵。

sentences.english: Lastly, we designed coding plan of internal code of full information for mongolian information processing system.
sentences.chinese: 最後設計出了蒙古文信息處理全息內部碼的編碼方案。

sentences.english: A kind of making real-color rainbow hologram with single-wavelength and single-beam are presented. First make three films of rainbow encoded.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種單波長單光束真彩色彩虹全息圖製作技術。

sentences.english: Holographic photographic technique is a basic experiment in university physics experiment.
sentences.chinese: 全息照相技術是大學物理實驗中的一個基礎實驗。

sentences.english: Application of wavelet transform in digital holography .
sentences.chinese: 小波變換在數字全息中的應用。
消色差和僞彩色全息圖。

sentences.english: A method of making true color moving holograms with one-wavelength laser is proposed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用單色激光器製作真彩色動感全息圖的方法。

sentences.english: A method which use ZEMAX software to design flat field holographic concave grating is given in this article.
sentences.chinese: 介紹利用ZEMAX軟件設計平場全息凹面光柵方法。

sentences.english: The team is now working on ways to make the holograms even smaller.
sentences.chinese: 這個團隊現在正致力於將全息圖製作地更小。

sentences.english: This paper presents the acoustical holography method for the identification of moving sound source.
sentences.chinese: 利用聲全息方法分析運動聲源的噪聲輻射。

sentences.english: But with a hologram, you can't see how light plays on the surface of the car.
sentences.chinese: 但在全息圖上看不出光打在車身上的效果。

sentences.english: In addition, the main quality indexes and controling methods of holographic metal dies are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 並詳細介紹了全息模版的主要質量指標及其控制方法。

sentences.english: The team is using a design technique that is similar to how people make holograms.
sentences.chinese: 該團隊採用了一種類似於生成全息圖像的設計技術。

sentences.english: This paper puts forward a method for measuring object's surface strain by holographic interferometry.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用全息干涉術測量物體表面應變的一種方法。

sentences.english: Traditional holography consists of wavefront recording and reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 經典光全息術包括波陣面記錄和波陣面重現兩步。

definition: the four social bonds: propriety, justice, integrity and honor/see 禮義廉恥|礼义廉耻[li3 yi4 lian2 chi3]/the four directions/the four limbs (Chinese medicine)/four-dimensional
nickname of the FAST radio telescope (in Guizhou)
